name: Spherezilla
description:
SPHEREZILLA (beta)

This game is all about the joy of being a giant monster who knocks things over and blows stuff up. The only thing more fun than building a city out of blocks is destroying it. The only thing more fun than building a sand castle is letting the waves wash it away. In Spherezilla you get the joy of knocking over beautiful buildings, breathing fire on them and letting your reign of terror last as long as possible (because the army just showed up, and they’re pissed!)  
 

Controls 

Control with Arrow Keys

Death Ray: X or Z

Jump: O or Space

Options 

Esc to Select Option.
